CustomField.description: The default owner for the agreement created from an opportunity. Valid values are Opportunity Owner and Current User. If not set, the Opportunity Owner will become the owner of the new agreement
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The default owner for the agreement created from an opportunity. Valid values are Opportunity Owner and Current User. If not set, the Opportunity Owner will become the owner of the new agreement
CustomField.label: Default Opportunity Agreement Owner
